<web-app xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" version="2.4" xsi:schemaLocation="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/j2ee/web-app_2_4.xsd"><!--  转码并判断系统是否设置了关闭  --><filter><filter-name>SetWebApplicationCharacterEncoding</filter-name><filter-class>cn.cbsw.tools.SetEncodeFilter</filter-class><init-param><param-name>defaultencoding</param-name><param-value>GBK</param-value></init-param><init-param><param-name>excludeUser</param-name><param-value>admin</param-value></init-param><!--  可以直接输入地址访问的页面   --><init-param><param-name>noRefererRequest</param-name><param-value>loginAction.do,GetDataServlet,danWeiBeiAnAction.do,renYuanBeiAnAction.do,login.jsp,reLoad.jsp,404.jsp,errorException.jsp,closeSystemReason.jsp,yc_login.jsp,avatar.jsp,index.jsp,lxwm.jsp,userunitAction.do,dianZiBiaoQianLiuXiangAction.do</param-value></init-param></filter><filter-mapping><filter-name>SetWebApplicationCharacterEncoding</filter-name><url-pattern>/*</url-pattern></filter-mapping><!-- 该过滤器要优先于spring security执行,从CA取到用户名填充到request域供security 验证 --><filter><filter-name>caLoginForSecurityFilter</filter-name><filter-class>cn.cbsw.security.CALoginForSecurityFilter</filter-class><init-param><description>CA登陆页面提交登陆标记(值一般是"CA")的hidden的name属性</description><param-name>login_type</param-name><param-value>login_type</param-value></init-param></filter><filter-mapping><filter-name>caLoginForSecurityFilter</filter-name><url-pattern>/j_spring_security_check</url-pattern></filter-mapping><filter><filter-name>springSecurityFilterChain</filter-name><filter-class>org.springframework.web.filter.DelegatingFilterProxy</filter-class></filter><filter-mapping><filter-name>springSecurityFilterChain</filter-name><url-pattern>/*</url-pattern></filter-mapping><!--<listener>		<listener-class>org.springframework.web.context.ContextLoaderListener</listener-class>	</listener> 外网 --><listener><listener-class>cn.cbsw.db.MyContextLoaderListener</listener-class></listener><listener><listener-class>cn.cbsw.listener.KaoheListener</listener-class></listener><listener><listener-class>cn.cbsw.listener.SjjhListener</listener-class></listener><listener><listener-class>cn.cbsw.listener.AuditRemindListener</listener-class></listener><!--  内网  --><listener><listener-class>cn.cbsw.gengxin.timer.SjjhListener</listener-class></listener><servlet><servlet-name>dispatcherServlet</servlet-name><servlet-class>org.springframework.web.servlet.DispatcherServlet</servlet-class><load-on-startup>1</load-on-startup></servlet>
